main event: A bright white light object was observed northwest of Dobbins AFB, Georgia on February 9, 1953.
interesting points: The object emitted a bright white light that changed to red and yellow at times., It was observed for approximately 15 minutes before disappearing below the horizon., The object appeared larger and brighter than red obstruction lights on the control tower., Observations were made by military personnel in the Air Defense Control Center., The disappearance from view coincided with a similar sighting reported from Knoxville, Tennessee.
sighted object: a bright white light changing to red and yellow
witness description: military personnel on duty in air defense
